Description.Text: Welcome to NH Sur, a three-star hotel conveniently located nearby the center of Spains capital city. This hotel is a practical place to stay both for business travelers and tourists visiting Madrid. Right in front of the hotel it is the main train station of Madrid, Atocha, from where departs most of the trains and high-speed trains (AVE) which connect the capital with the rest of the cities of Spain. All the city's main attractions are nearby within a 5-minute walk such as the Prado Museum, the best art gallery of Spain and one of the most important in the world and the Reina Sofia Museum, with a fine collection of contemporary art. Moreover you can enjoy of the Thyssen-Bornemisza Collection, Caixa Forum exhibition center, and have a walk along Paseo del Prado, one of the most beautiful avenues of Madrid, until the Cibeles fountain, with the impressive and monumental Palacio de Telecommunications, headquarters of the post office, it is a must of Madrid. The hotel itself is a cozy 8 floors high building, refurbished on 2004, with 68 rooms (11-15 m2), comfortable and elegant, with pastel colors, and equipped with flat screen TV, telephone, and Wireless internet connection. The superior rooms offer you even more exclusive features. Enjoy the buffet breakfast in the morning, from 7am during the week, and from 8am on weekends and holidays, well-stocked with cold meats, fruits, pastries, cereals, juices, hot dishes, and typical Spanish food like tortilla de patatas or churros. For your business meetings, conferences and private events for up to 25 people, the hotel offer one meeting room, on the ground floor with audiovisual equipment (overhead projection, TV, video, projector), direct-line and coded telephone and fax, and external services on demand. Enjoy your stay in the lobby area, with free WiFi connection, and a Business Center with a PC and printer for your personal use.

The three-star hotel NH Sur it is located in the heart of the Art-Triangle of Madrid, composed by The Prado Museum, Reina Sofia Museum of Contemporary Art and the private collection of the Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum. NH Sur it is nestled to walking distance from the downtown, the famous Las Letras Quartier, a pedestrian neighborhood full of tapas places, all kind of restaurants and an active nightlife zone; and The Retiro Park. It is a convenient hotel for business people and tourist's ones, as a starting point to discover the capital of the country in all its facets. The Prado Museum, the best art gallery of Spain and one of the most important in the world; Reina Sofia Museum, with a fine collection of contemporary art. The Thyssen-Bornemisza Collection, Caixa Forum exhibition center, and have a walk along Paseo del Prado, one of the most beautiful avenues of Madrid.

Standard Double - 12 m2 comfortable rooms with pastel colors and welcoming atmosphere. Rooms are soundproof and the extremely comfortable 25cm high mattresses guaranteed a perfect sleep.You could choose a single room with big bed (1,20 x 1,90), or double room with queen size bed (1,50 x1,90m) or two twin beds (90 x1,90m). Most of the room are located at the back of the hotel, to a peaceful courtyard, which guarantees the rest of the hotel guests; however the hotel have some rooms at the front of the hotel, with views to the monumental Old Atocha railway station and the new one designed by Moneo. All the rooms are equipped with modern flat screen TV, telephone, free Wi.FI internet access, minibar, working desk, choice of pillows, bathroom with bathtub and integrated shower, mirror, bathroom amenities and hairdryer. They are available for smoker and nonsmoker.
Standard Single - 7 m2 comfortable rooms with pastel colors and welcoming atmosphere. Rooms are soundproof and the extremely comfortable 25cm high mattresses guaranteed a perfect sleep.You could choose a single room with bed (0,90 x 1,90), Most of the room are located at the back of the hotel, to a peaceful courtyard, which guarantees the rest of the hotel guests. All the rooms are equipped with modern flat screen TV, telephone, free Wi.FI internet access, minibar, working desk, choice of pillows, bathroom with bathtub and integrated shower, mirror, bathroom amenities and hairdryer. They are available for smoker and nonsmoker.
